title: LinkedIn | Senior Software Engineer | 3.5 YOE | December 2022
content:
Education: B.Tech, CSE
Years of Experience: 3.5
Company: LinkedIn
Title/Level: Senior SWE
Location: Bangalore
Base pay: 50L
Signing Bonus: 2L
Stock bonus: $140000 (25% vesting for 4 years)
Performance Bonus: 10% of Base
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~85LPA
Benefits: Standard Benefits

title: Zeta Directi | Site Reliability Engineer (L1) SRE-1 | Bangalore/Hyderabad Fresher
content:
Education: B.E CSE Tier 3 college
Years of Experience: 0
Prior Experience: 9 months internship (product based startups 3-month and 6-month)
Date of the Offer: 12-06-2024
Company: Directi
Title/Level: Site Reliability Engineer (SRE-1)
Location: Bangalore/Hyderabad
Salary: 900000
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 200000 (if resign in 1 year need to payback )
Stock bonus: 225000 
Bonus: 125000 beginning of the 2nd year
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 9+2+2.25+1.25+0.70 (benifits) =~ 15.70
Benefits: Free snacks and meals employee cost sharing. Paid leaves. Flexible working hours
Other details: Extra benifits worth 1lac. Negotiated to increase base or stock but no success. Accepted since no counter offer inhand
Total = 16.70
